item.title: Emotionally Intelligent People Use 1 Word to Get More Done With Less Stress
item.description: Want to increase your productivity while lowering stress and anxiety? Try using a sprint.

item.title: Delta Just Published a 300-Page Coffee Table Book as a Thank-You to Its People
item.description: It’s a book of history, told through the stories of Delta’s employees over the past 100 years.

item.title: Delta’s AI Concierge Is Trying to Fix the Worst Thing About Travel. It Just Might Work
item.description: Delta has a bold plan to eliminate the uncertainty of travel using AI.

item.title: 12 Objects That Tell the Story of a Wild Year
item.description: better or for worse From frog costumes to bucket hats, these 12 objects tell the story of 2025.

item.title: How to Get Product Leadership Right
item.description: Organizations need product leaders, but they don’t know what to look for. Let’s change that.
